transportAdvice: Minibuses run regular routes between main towns and are an affordable way to get around. Taxis are widely available and fares should be agreed upon before the ride. Renting a car is a good option for exploring the island's beaches, waterfalls, and spice plantations.

weather.description: Dry season with warm, sunny conditions and comfortable trade winds.
Continued dry weather with pleasant temperatures and clear skies.
Driest month with consistently sunny days, ideal for beach and water activities.
Warm and mostly dry as the dry season winds down.
Transition month with increasing afternoon showers as the rainy season approaches.
Rainy season begins with regular afternoon tropical showers, though mornings are often clear.
Wet and humid with frequent tropical rain, though the island is lush and green.
Peak of the wet season with heavy rainfall and some hurricane risk.
Very wet with the highest hurricane risk; lush tropical scenery compensates.
Still rainy but conditions start to improve toward the end of the month.
Rain decreases as the dry season approaches with more frequent sunny days.
Transitioning to dry season with warm conditions and the start of tourist season.
